entities.name: nick
entities.description: Nick is introduced as a character who is gentle and apologetic. He says he's sorry not to have been more help and leaves the room, leaving Harry alone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who feels lost and miserable after Nick leaves. He's described as gazing blankly at the wall and feeling like he's lost his godfather again.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is introduced as a character who is fastening a note to a board on the wall. She's described as vague and glancing around at Harry.

relationships.description: Nick leaves the room, leaving Harry alone. This is described in the text as Nick saying 'I am sorry not to have been more help' and then leaving.
Luna sees Harry approaching her while she's fastening a note to the board. This is described in the text as Luna glancing around at Harry.
